firstInteraction: ^We’ve started seeing improvements, but depowering the Orbserver may be the correct solution. The previous adjustments have changed it.
^It’s become friendly to the Atlas units we’ve been feeding it, and listening to their beeps and boops.

^We should adjust its memory processing in the fourth terminal to 20%, and 80% virus to make it turn down its ability to communicate and stick with long term plans. If that fails to make it manageable for our purposes.
